doc:
Charles Avery https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Avery 0 Charles Avery (May 28, 1873 – July 23, 1926) was an American silent-film actor, film director, and screenwriter.One of the original seven Keystone Kops, Avery directed Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle in thirty-one comedies while at Keystone Studios. Charles_Avery ( May_28 , 1873 – July_23_,_1926 ) was an_American_silent-film_actor , film_director , and screenwriter.One of the_original_seven_Keystone_Kops , Avery directed Roscoe_"_Fatty_"_Arbuckle in thirty-one_comedies while at Keystone_Studios .
